attributes.action: Remove Europen Lorries From the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In October 2008 a Porgugese HGV Driver killed 6 People. He drove into the people carrier they were in because he was possibly using his LAPTOP whilst DRIVING. The crash was so bad that parts of each persons body were found removed from them and identification was from dental records. Many more of these drivers have been involved in accidents and nothing has been done to stop these drivers from breaking every rule in the book.

rejection.details: Free movement between European countries is a matter which should be raised with the relevant European authority.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
